description: This fall lies at the end of a dirt road.  There is a camp at the end of the road.  The special thing about this waterfall is that walking the dirt road you do not sense a presence of a huge waterfall.  It's well hidden and what a beauty.
directions: This waterfall lies off a dirt road off the Birchtown Rd  near Boylstown, NS.  The falls themselve sare at  45.484106°; -61.453569°
title: Clam Harbour River- Upper Falls
